sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import UserContext from "./../../context/userContext"; import ReactTooltip from "react-tooltip"; export default class SingularPost extends Component { render() { const { title: title, content: content, slug: slug, author: author, image: image, rating: rating, postDate: postDate, day: day, dataType: dataType, post: post, } = this.props.toPass; return (
{day} {postDate}
{(userContext) => { return ( by {userContext.getAuthor(author)} ); }}

{title}

{content.length >= 500 ? content.substring(0, 500) + "..." : content}

Read More
{rating ? this.getFormattedRating(rating) : 0}
); } }
